title: The Last Astronaut's Log
description: Craft a prompt that generates a log entry from an astronaut who has just discovered they are the last human alive.

title: A Detective with a Sweet Tooth
description: Generate a short story opening about a hard-boiled detective who solves crimes using clues related to candy and desserts.

title: The Sentient Toaster's Demands
description: Write a prompt that generates a list of demands from a newly sentient toaster who is unhappy with the quality of bread it's being given.

title: Historical Figure in Modern Times
description: Craft a prompt that generates a social media post from a famous historical figure (e.g., Cleopatra, Shakespeare) reacting to a modern trend.

title: Cyberpunk Potion Shop
description: Generate a description of a potion shop in a cyberpunk city. What kind of digital spells and elixirs does it sell?

title: Explain to a Child
description: Write a prompt that explains a complex scientific concept (like black holes or DNA) in a way a five-year-old can understand.

title: The Alien Tourist Review
description: Craft a prompt that generates a hilariously bad online review of Earth written by an alien tourist.
